name: Amazing multi-day excursions to Isla Espiritu Santo aboard 70 ft sailing-cruiser
description: No Trip to La Paz is complete without visiting the fascinating and spectacular UNESCO World Heritage protected Islands and national parks of Espiritu Santo & Isla San Francisco. What better way to explore this incredible area than staying aboard a big boat in calm bays surrounded by 60 ft clear aquamarine waters and pristine beaches. You can sail, kayak, paddle board, windsurf, snorkel, fish, hike, visit sea caves and relax on the beaches. Toys included. En-route and in the bays you can watch for whales, dolphins, sea turtles, flying rays and swim with friendly sea lions in an area teeming with tropical fish. Your Capitan, meals and marine park permits are provided so you can participate in the adventure, relax and enjoy the experience. Perfect for families and friends, we can sleep groups up to 6 guests for multi-day charters. Welcome Aboard!Expedia

name: Araiza Palmira Hotel
address: Blvd Alberto Alvarado, 23010 La Paz, Baja California Sur
description: Hotel Palmira is located off the shores of Sea of Cortez, just a couple of minutes away of the main attractions and only 20 minutes away from the airport. The hotel features 119 comfortable rooms, swimming pool, tennis court, 5 meeting rooms, laundry services and restaurant.iHotelier/iStay

name: Hyatt Place La Paz
address: Km. 7.5 Carretera a Pichilingue, 23010 La Paz, Baja California Sur
description: Hyatt Place La Paz is located 10 minutes’ drive from central La Paz, Baja California Sur. The hotel is modern and offers an outdoor pool, restaurant and bar. Free WiFi is also available. The elegant and moderns rooms include a seating area, air conditioning and cable TV. There is a dining area equipped with a microwave, fridge and coffee machine. The bathrooms all have a hairdryer. The property offers the Hyatt Grand Bed, a unique concept of Hyatt Place. At Hyatt Place La Paz guests will enjoy of a fitness centre. Other facilities offered at the property include meeting facilities, a tour desk and luggage storage. An array of activities can be enjoyed on site or in the surroundings, including golfing, sports fishing and diving. Set right across the Marina Puerta Cortes, the hotel enables guests access to play golf in the exclusive Golf Course in the exclusive El Cortes Gary Player Signature Golf Course.

name: Costa Baja Resort & Spa
address: Carretera a Pichilingue Km 7.5, 23010 La Paz, Baja California Sur
description: Discover the captivating oasis of Hotel Indigo Costa Baja Resort & Spa, where the desert meets the sea. Nestled between the Sea of Cortez and La Paz Bay, our beachfront resort in La Paz, Mexico, offers unparalleled service and breathtaking views perfect for vacations and destination weddings in the Baja. Embark on a journey of wellness at Espíritu Spa. Relax on our white-sand beach and take a swim in our infinity pool. Tee off at the El Cortés Golf Club. Enjoy bold Mexican and international flavors at our restaurants, Cardon and Barco. Indulge in beautifully designed rooms with garden and pool views. Discover the essence of La Paz along the Malecón or enjoy water sports at the marina. The perfect blend of serenity and adventure.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: City Express by Marriott La Paz
address: Paseo Alvaro Obregon, Km. 2.5, 23010 La Paz, Baja California Sur
description: At City Express by Marriott La Paz, experience our beautiful beachfront location and enjoy the proximity that our hotel has to dozens of major businesses. The beaches of La Paz are famous for their beautiful blue waters and white sand. Tecolte and Balandra are two popular beaches, where locals and tourists swim, sun and soak up the natural beauty.If you're in La Paz in February, don't miss the Gray Whale Festival. Take a guided excursion to the Ojo de Liebre lagoon, where you can see the giant whales migrate through Baja California Sur. There's no better place to get up close to the action to see these amazing creatures.For the best that downtown has to offer, visit Velasco Garden in the city's main square. It's a hub of activity and a great place to relax, visit nearby cafes and people watch after a long day of meetings. If you have time, stop by the Catedral de Nuestra Señora de la Paz, a cathedral constructed in the late 19th Century, that houses dozens of works of art rescued from old missions.Marriott

name: Puerta Cortez Residenses
address: KM 7.5 Carretera a Pichilingue, 23010 La Paz, Baja California Sur
description: Our Marina Village hosts restaurants offering room-service, mini-mart, health center, tour operators, and a coffee shop. The Blue Cortes Beach Club has its infinity pool and top restaurant and bar. El Cortes Golf Club, Mexico’s only 18 hole Gary Player Signature Golf Club, Tennis Courts, Fitness Center, and Spa. This 5-star resort includes free WiFi, exclusive access to all Puerta Cortes amenities. A concierge is available for booking private or public tours to the activities within and around the resort. Breakfast and lunch are served at Blue Cortes Beach Club, Cardon at El Cortes Golf Club or DoceCuarenta Coffee Shop in the Marina Village. For Lunch and dinner Puerta Cortes also has 3 restaurants in the Marina Village, Japanese food Odayaka, International Cuisine at Azul Marino, or Italian at la Barcaccia. Manuel Marquez de Leon International Airport is 17.7 km from the property and San Jose del Cabo Airport is 170 km. Check-in is to be made in the Marina Towns Official Puerta Cortes Reception

name: La Posada Hotel & Beach Club
address: Nueva Reforma 115, 23010 La Paz, Baja California Sur
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 20 individually decorated guestrooms, featuring refrigerators and minibars. Your Select Comfort bed comes with down comforters and Egyptian cotton sheets. Rooms have private balconies. Wired and wireless Internet access is complimentary, while 32-inch LCD televisions with cable programming provide entertainment. Bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature jetted bathtubs and rainfall showerheads. Amenities Pamper yourself with onsite massages, body treatments, and facials. You're sure to appreciate the recreational amenities, which include 2 outdoor swimming pools and a health club. This resort also features complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and babysitting (surcharge). The shuttle (surcharge) will take you to the nearby beach or shopping center. Business}, Other Amenities Featured amenities include complimentary wired Internet access, a business center, and limo/town car service. Planning an event in La Paz? This resort has 2152 square feet (200 square meters) of space consisting of a conference center and a meeting room. For a surcharge, guests may use a shuttle from the airport to the hotel (available 24 hours) and a cruise ship terminal shuttle. Property Location With a stay at La Posada Hotel & Beach Club in La Paz (El Manglito), you'll be steps from Baja California Peninsula and 14 minutes by foot from Hospital General ISSSTE La Paz. This 4-star resort is 17.5 mi (28.2 km) from Balandra Beach and 1.6 mi (2.6 km) from Malecon La Paz. Dining Enjoy a meal at the restaurant or snacks in the 2 coffee shops/cafes. The resort also offers room service (during limited hours). Mingle with other guests at the complimentary reception, held daily. Wrap up your day with a drink at the bar/lounge, the beach bar, or the poolside bar. Mandatory Charges You'll be asked to pay the following charges at the property: Resort fee: 3 percent of room rate The resort fee includes:Additional inclusions Beach access Beach towels Bicycle storage Breakfast Concierge service Fitness center access Housekeeping In-room bottled water In-room coffee In-room safe In-room safe and safe insurance Laundry facilities Parking Phone calls Pool access Self parking Spa tub access Valet parking We have included all charges provided to us by the property. Optional Charges Airport shuttle fee: MXN 350.00 per vehicle Airport shuttle fee per child: MXN 0.00 Pet fee: MXN 300 per pet, per stay The above list may not be comprehensive. Fees and deposits may not include tax and are subject to change. To arrange pick-up, guests must contact the property 48 hours prior to arrival, using the contact information on the booking confirmation. Front desk staff will greet guests on arrival.
